verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w time|strong="H8145"\w*:

“\w Get|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*! \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* message \w that|strong="H5892"\w* \w I|strong="H6965"\w* \w give|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w*.”

\w This|strong="H1697"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* accordance \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H1419"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, requiring \w a|strong="H3068"\w* three-day \w journey|strong="H4109"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w first|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w journey|strong="H4109"\w*, \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* set out \w into|strong="H2015"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w*, “Forty \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w overturned|strong="H2015"\w*!”

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* Ninevites believed God. \w They|strong="H5704"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w dressed|strong="H3847"\w* \w in|strong="H3847"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w* \w of|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w least|strong="H6996"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3427"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w reached|strong="H5060"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \w took|strong="H4428"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* robe, \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w himself|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* ashes.

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1241"\w* \w issued|strong="H2199"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w proclamation|strong="H2199"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*: “\w By|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w decree|strong="H2940"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H4428"\w* \w nobles|strong="H1419"\w*: Let \w no|strong="H8354"\w* \w man|strong="H1419"\w* \w or|strong="H1241"\w* beast, \w herd|strong="H1241"\w* \w or|strong="H1241"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, \w taste|strong="H2938"\w* \w anything|strong="H3972"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w*. \w They|strong="H4428"\w* must \w not|strong="H4325"\w* \w eat|strong="H7462"\w* \w or|strong="H1241"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

Furthermore, \w let|strong="H7725"\w* \w both|strong="H4480"\w* \w man|strong="H7451"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* beast \w be|strong="H1870"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w with|strong="H3680"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H7451"\w* everyone \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w earnestly|strong="H2394"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* God. \w Let|strong="H7725"\w* each \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w knows|strong="H3045"\w*? \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H4310"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w relent|strong="H5162"\w*; \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H4310"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w His|strong="H7725"\w* \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H2740"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* perish.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w actions|strong="H4639"\w*—\w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*—\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w relented|strong="H5162"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w disaster|strong="H7451"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w threatened|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.
